name: Errand (SethBrock)
description:
Errand

A game made at APU by Seth Brock

Description

You are on a deserted island... well you have someone with you, but she's sick! Follow her instructions and collect the things she needs! You have the island all to yourself to explore, but what she asks for could be anywhere!

Instructions

WASD = Movement

Space = Jump

Shift + Movement = Sprint
